meaning_str.bing:
n. 伟人；名人；伟大的事物；大事；名家；全部；〈英俚〉牛津大学学士学位考试
adj. 伟大的；优异的；贵族的；很多的；伟大的；擅长；巨大的；数量大的
adv. 〈口〉很好地；很好地；极好地；很棒地
网络. 最大的；即比较字符的编码大小；最伟大的

伟人；名人；伟大的事物；大事；名家；全部；〈英俚〉牛津大学学士学位考试
伟大的；优异的；贵族的；很多的；伟大的；擅长；巨大的；数量大的
〈口〉很好地；很好地；极好地；很棒地
最大的；即比较字符的编码大小；最伟大的

最好的；最伟大的；最大的；（great的最高级）
很好地；出色地；（great的最高级）

1.en: Perhaps the greatest of these results from the lack of exercise, and is referred to by professional coach potatoes as telly belly.
1.cn: 也许最大的危险来自于缺乏锻炼，其后果被专业沙发土豆称为电视肚。

2.en: Among the many traits that made Charles Darwin one of the greatest minds in science was his pertinacious personality.
2.cn: 达尔文的各种特质中，让他成为最伟大科学智者之一的，是他执著的个性。

3.en: It is, to say the least, one of the greatest economic turnrounds in human history.
3.cn: 至少，这是人类历史上最伟大的经济转折之一。

0.en: He is my greatest triumph. So impressive.
0.cn: 拉拢到他是我最大的胜利。真是叹为观止。

1.en: The fairy kingdom is the greatest secret of this land. Our duty is to protect it.
1.cn: 精灵王国是这片土地上最大的秘密，我们的责任就是保护它。

2.en: Oh, really? Since meeting her, what have been your greatest accomplishments? Easy. Sleeping with Penny.
2.cn: 是吗，那自从认识她后你最大的成就都有什么？很好答，跟佩妮上床。

3.en: Vesuvius wiped out the entire population of Pompeii. It was one of the greatest natural disasters the world had ever known.
3.cn: 维苏威火山爆发毁掉了整个庞贝城，它是人类已知的最大的自然灾害之一。

4.en: Are you honestly comparing Thanksgiving dinner at Wolowitz's mom's with one of the greatest tragedies in the history of mankind? Yes.
4.cn: 你居然把Wolowitz家的感恩节聚会和人类史上最大的人伦悲剧相提并论？是的。

5.en: Over time, I leaned that by nature, most people's greatest strengths are also connected to their most significant weaknesses. And striving hard for big things is bound to lead you to painful falls.
5.cn: 慢慢的我发现从天性上来说，许多人最大的长处和他们最大的弱点相联系。为了高目标努力拼搏肯定会有跌痛的时候。

6.en: Oh, this is the greatest day of my life!
6.cn: 噢，这是我生命中最美好的一天。

7.en: Is this Harv, the world's greatest agent?
7.cn: 这是世上最棒的经纪人哈夫吗？

8.en: You will enjoy the greatest adventure of all.
8.cn: 你会体验到世上最伟大的冒险。

9.en: And, she's the greatest sister a guy could ask for.
9.cn: 她是所有男人梦寐以求的好妹妹。

10.en: Meet Sergei Krikalev, the greatest time traveler in human history.
10.cn: 谢尔盖.克里卡列夫是人类历史上最伟大的穿越时空者。

11.en: Is it still the greatest movie in history? It never was.
11.cn: 它依然是史上最棒的电影吗？从来都不是。

12.en: Mabel Lane Fox?So you've caught the greatest heiress of the season.
12.cn: 梅布尔·莱恩·福克斯你攀上了社交季中最好的女继承人。

13.en: It's the greatest gift we have to bear their pain without breaking.
13.cn: 这是我们最好的礼物，去不断的承担痛苦吧。

14.en: This is supposed to be, like, the greatest day of my life, you know?
14.cn: 这本来是我今生最快乐的日子。

15.en: I sent the greatest soldier in history to make sure that didn't happen.
15.cn: 为了防止这样，我才派了历史上最伟大的战士去做。

16.en: For more than a century, we were the greatest steel-making nation on earth.
16.cn: 一个多世纪前我们是世界大最的产钢国。

17.en: Oh man, she's so smoking, she has got the greatest set of... no guys around.
17.cn: 老兄，她好惹火她有一对最炫的…这儿没男的？

18.en: That's how America built the greatest middle class the world has ever known.
18.cn: 正是这些东西让我们打造出全球最强大的中产阶级。

19.en: And I will be the greatest villain of all time! That's what I'm talking about.
19.cn: 而我就会成为前无古人 后无来者的超级大坏蛋！这就是我要说的
